cont.entity_a: Perfect starter choice for beginners. Great product for beginners in photography.

More features than expected. Reliable and easy to figure out with plenty of functions. Upgraded CMOS sensor and added features. Digital SLR with many options for creative pictures and a simple automatic mode. High end enough to do everything and still not overly complicated. Easy to use with many features. Many manual settings to choose from.
cont.entity_b: Focal plane dust removal system is unmatched. Allows selection of photographic scenes or customization.

cont.entity_a: Lens that came with it is very nice. Needed an image-stabilization lens for low-light shots. Lens in the kit is a step below the camera. Kit lens has good sharpness and fast focusing. Fits all other Canon lenses.

Quality is quite good for an old model DSLR. Camera is very high quality, takes excellent high-res digital photos. High-quality photographs and easy to use. Solid Canon quality at a reasonable price. Least digital noise in higher ISO settings. Durable body, very user-friendly settings. Camera takes great shots with great detail and speed. Lightweight and takes outstanding photographs with good quality lenses. Camera has been a workhorse and held up well over several years.
cont.entity_b: Kodak KAF8300CE high performance CCD used. Excellent picture quality. Nice weight and balance. Powerful flash for its size.

cont.entity_a: Camera and extra things were in excellent condition. Seller added extra things without any extra cost.
cont.entity_b: Price was great and came with full array of accessories.

cont.entity_a: Large LCD display is beneficial for reduced near vision. Quick change on point of focus and a larger LCD viewer.
Very easy to use, takes great shots. Easy to understand manual and basic functions. Easy to learn to use with great photo clarity.
cont.entity_b: E-300 is intuitive and easy to use. Easy to learn and operate. Menus are easy to navigate with well-laid out buttons.

cont.entity_a: Camera sensor failed and is too expensive to repair.
Fits great for small hands, no shutter delay. Battery compartment adds more surface area and weight. Camera is compact, but difficult to handle with large lenses.
cont.entity_b: Rubber-coated aluminum chassis and smooth-working controls. Viewfinder is a little dim and focusing can be tricky.

cont.entity_a: Good camera for astrophotography with some limitations.

cont.entity_b: Finicky and difficult to focus without perfect lighting.
